content.rendered:
Side Cargo Loader

(Side Boat Loader, Kayak Loader, Canoe Loader)

This amazing Side Cargo Loader turns the two-person job of loading into a simple one-person task!  With the push of a button load your boat, kayak, canoe, inflatable, pontoon boat or even an item such as a ladder.  It’s automatic and stress free.   Click to see a video of it in action

Benefits

  • Takes the watercraft or cargo off of your vehicle.
  • Lifts the object up for easy loading.
  • Ties it down for safe travel.
  • Automatically loads quickly, easily and safely even in the rain!
  • Restores independence to those with limited mobility or back problems.
  • Eliminates climbing your motor home, truck or trailer.

How It Works

Lift your cargo with one finger!  Push the loading button on the wireless remote and the Side Cargo Loader will lift the object vertically and rotate it until it gently comes to rest on top of your vehicle.  Uneven ground is no problem!  The Side Cargo Loader easily compensates for any differences, including a load not completely square to the vehicle. 

Securing your cargo is a snap!  Standing comfortably on the ground all you need to do is watch as the Side Cargo Loader does all the work.  Then simply connect the lines to the places provided on the loading system’s frame and you’re done!  On higher vehicles like campers and motor homes, connect the lines to the tie down areas on the side of your vehicle.  Now rest easy knowing you’ll never have to climb on top of your vehicle again!

Unloading is as simple as loading.  With the push of a button the Side Cargo Loader gracefully lowers your cargo with no assistance from you until the object is resting conveniently on the ground.  You don’t even have to set down your coffee cup.  Disconnect the clips and you’re ready to go!

Specifications

  • Maximum lifting capacity of 200 pounds
  • Maximum width 65 inches
  • Accommodates kayaks, canoes, pontoon boats, inflatables, ladders, and more
  • Made from lightweight, aircraft-grade aluminum that is extremely strong
  • All hardware is stainless steel, not zinc-plated steel
  • All components are rust and maintenance free
  • Operated by our wireless remote control system with back-up wired remote
  • Mountable on pick-ups, vans, SUV’s, cargo trailers, motor homes, truck campers, camper trailers, etc.
  • Attaches to your vehicles existing rack.

Installation

Your new automatic Side Cargo Loader attaches to your vehicles existing cargo rack.  The system comes in a box supplied with all the necessary parts for assembly as well as an easy to use manual.  Common assembly time is about one day.
